sentence: Eating ______ is good for your digestive system.
sentence_translation: 吃全谷物对消化系统有益。

sentence: You ______ eat more vegetables to stay healthy.
sentence_translation: 你应该多吃蔬菜以保持健康。

sentence: ______ contains more fiber than white rice.
sentence_translation: 糙米比白米含有更多纤维。

sentence: She ______ cook delicious healthy meals in 30 minutes.
sentence_translation: 她能在30分钟内做出美味的健康餐。

sentence: ______ are high in fat and calories.
sentence_translation: 炸薯条脂肪和卡路里含量高。

sentence: I ______ choose a salad instead of fried food for lunch.
sentence_translation: 我午餐会选择沙拉而不是油炸食品。

sentence: Too much ______ in the diet can cause health problems.
sentence_translation: 饮食中脂肪过多会导致健康问题。

sentence: You ______ feel tired if you don't eat enough protein.
sentence_translation: 如果你蛋白质摄入不足，可能会感到疲倦。

sentence: Fruits and vegetables are rich in ______.
sentence_translation: 水果和蔬菜富含纤维。

sentence: Fresh food will ______ quickly if not refrigerated.
sentence_translation: 新鲜食物如果不冷藏会很快变质。

sentence: Milk is a good source of ______ like calcium.
sentence_translation: 牛奶是钙等矿物质的良好来源。

sentence: Some schools ______ junk food in their cafeterias.
sentence_translation: 一些学校禁止在自助餐厅出售垃圾食品。

sentence: A balanced diet should control daily ______ intake.
sentence_translation: 均衡饮食应控制每日卡路里摄入量。

sentence: The store will ______ healthy snacks this weekend.
sentence_translation: 这家商店本周末将对健康零食打折。

sentence: ______ is a good cardio exercise to burn calories.
sentence_translation: 拳击是燃烧卡路里的良好有氧运动。

sentence: Eating too much without exercise will make you ______.
sentence_translation: 吃得太多而不运动将会使你增重。

sentence: Running and swimming are popular ______ activities.
sentence_translation: 跑步和游泳是受欢迎的有氧运动。

sentence: She wants to ______ by exercising regularly and eating well.
sentence_translation: 她想通过定期锻炼和健康饮食来减重。

sentence: He swims in the third ______ of the swimming pool.
sentence_translation: 他在游泳池的第三泳道游泳。

sentence: We can ______ a healthy combo from the restaurant.
sentence_translation: 我们可以从这家餐厅点一份健康套餐。

sentence: He put his gym bag in the ______ before starting exercise.
sentence_translation: 他在开始锻炼前把健身包放进了储物柜。

sentence: The new healthy café has a ______ and comfortable environment.
sentence_translation: 这家新开的健康咖啡馆环境时髦又舒适。

sentence: The school ______ offers a variety of healthy food options.
sentence_translation: 学校自助餐厅提供多种健康食品选择。

sentence: We had a ______ meal with plenty of vegetables and protein.
sentence_translation: 我们吃了一顿不错的饭，有很多蔬菜和蛋白质。

sentence: Too much ______ is often high in salt and fat.
sentence_translation: 太多外卖食品通常含盐和脂肪量高。

sentence: A ______ healthy breakfast includes eggs, milk and fruit.
sentence_translation: 典型的健康早餐包括鸡蛋、牛奶和水果。

sentence: The street ______ sells fresh fruit and vegetable juices.
sentence_translation: 街头小贩售卖新鲜的果蔬汁。

sentence: ______ food can make you feel uncomfortable after eating.
sentence_translation: 油腻的食物会让你吃完后感到不舒服。

sentence: I ordered a ______ of grilled chicken and salad.
sentence_translation: 我点了一份烤鸡和沙拉的套餐。

sentence: Regular exercise helps him stay ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 定期锻炼帮助他保持身体状况良好。

sentence: Many companies provide healthy snacks in the ______.
sentence_translation: 许多公司在工作场所提供健康零食。

sentence: She ______ fresh fruit ______ candy as a snack.
sentence_translation: 她比起糖果更喜欢新鲜水果作为零食。

sentence: Whole wheat ______ is a good source of carbohydrates.
sentence_translation: 全麦意大利面是碳水化合物的良好来源。

sentence: Choosing home-cooked meals ______ ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 选择家常菜是我的偏好。

sentence: Oranges are rich in ______ C.
sentence_translation: 橙子富含维生素C。

sentence: I ______ ______ ______ ______ yoga than lift weights.
sentence_translation: 比起举重，我更愿意做瑜伽。

sentence: Chicken, fish and beans are good sources of ______.
sentence_translation: 鸡肉、鱼和豆类是蛋白质的良好来源。

sentence: He ______ running ______ ______ cycling for exercise.
sentence_translation: 锻炼时，他比起骑自行车更喜欢跑步。

sentence: Understanding ______ is important for making healthy food choices.
sentence_translation: 了解营养对做出健康的食物选择很重要。

sentence: Many people make ______ ______ at the beginning of a new year.
sentence_translation: 许多人在新年伊始制定健康计划。

sentence: A ______ does not eat any animal products, including meat and dairy.
sentence_translation: 严格素食者不吃任何动物制品，包括肉类和乳制品。

sentence: Schools should ______ ______ ______ ______ among students.
sentence_translation: 学校应该鼓励学生养成健康饮食习惯。

sentence: ______ provide energy for daily activities.
sentence_translation: 碳水化合物为日常活动提供能量。

sentence: A ______ ______ ______ is key to a healthy diet.
sentence_translation: 均衡的食物搭配是健康饮食的关键。

sentence: She joined a ______ to improve her fitness level.
sentence_translation: 她参加了健身训练营以提高体能水平。

sentence: Regular exercise and a healthy diet can help you ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 定期锻炼和健康饮食能帮助你减重。

sentence: ______ ______ often contains preservatives and additives.
sentence_translation: 预制食品通常含有防腐剂和添加剂。

sentence: Eating late at night may cause you to ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 深夜进食可能会使你增重。

sentence: Losing weight can improve health for those who are ______.
sentence_translation: 减重可以改善超重人群的健康状况。

sentence: A short walk after lunch can ______ ______ and improve focus.
sentence_translation: 午饭后短距离散步可以提神醒脑，提高专注力。

sentence: He goes to the gym three times a week to ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 他每周去健身房三次举重。

sentence: Many people ______ ______ ______ after work to relax and exercise.
sentence_translation: 许多人下班后去健身房放松和锻炼。

sentence: You ______ drink enough water every day to stay hydrated.
sentence_translation: 你应该每天喝足够的水以保持水分。

sentence: It's important to ______ ______ ______ to prevent diseases.
sentence_translation: 保持健康饮食对预防疾病很重要。

sentence: You ______ ______ start your health plan as soon as possible.
sentence_translation: 你最好尽快开始你的健康计划。

sentence: Changing bad eating habits is necessary to ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 改变不良饮食习惯对减重很有必要。

sentence: He has exercised for five days ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 他已经连续锻炼了五天。
